name: Save Cubefix!
description:
Save Cubefix! is a 2D platformer game made with Unreal Engine 5 during FIT CVUT Spring Gamejam 2023.

===== Ingredient used in this game =====

  • A-typiciall dice/cube usage
    • thematically -  cube names and looks
  • Legionary/legion
    • thematically - roman legionaries are attacking us
    • ?mechanically? - taking inspiration from the Red dwarf's Legion episode - characters are sharing abilities when close together
  • Senses/Meaning
    • thematically - the game has a meaning - an end goal - to save the dog
    • ?mechanically? - characters have abilities based on senses - better vision and touch (the game is ready for extending these)
  • Unexpected connections/ entanglement
    • thematically - unexpected dog behavior (he drank the power up); quantum tunneling of enemies
    • mechanically - characters have to be together (entangled) for their abilities to work
